typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fixedsource1
fixedsource1 derive(Field1 = substring(Column_1,1,7),
		Field2 = substring(Column_1,8,8),
		Field3 = substring(Column_1, 15,10),
		Field4 = substring(Column_1,25,11),
		Field5 = substring(Column_1, 36,10),
		Field6 = substring(Column_1,46,12),
		Field7 = substring(Column_1,58,1)) ~> MapFields
